cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on September 20, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 8370, Legislation to Name United States Post Offices

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 115 (Wednesday, July 13, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. THOMPSON of Pennsylvania:
H.R. 8370.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 7 of the U.S. Constitution in
that the legislation exercises legislative power granted to
Congress by that clause ``to establish Post Offices and post
Roads.''
[Page H6336]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 415 High Street in Freeport, Pennsylvania, as the "Corporal Joseph Rodney Chapman Post Office".
